name: ampache
tagline: A web-based media server for streaming, browsing, and sharing music and video libraries
description: Ampache is a self-hosted web-based music streaming server. It allows users to stream, browse, and share music and videos from any web browser or compatible client. It supports multi-user access, playlists, and API integrations.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Play videos alongside your music collection. Complete media server

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create accounts for family and friends with individual preferences. Share your library safely

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Create, edit, and share playlists across devices. Organize your listening

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with mobile apps and third-party clients. Extend functionality

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find songs, albums, and artists instantly with powerful search. Discover your collection

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, responsive design works on all devices. Beautiful music experience
